onset.Description: Onset of the event (in samples) measured from the beginning of the acquisition.

Levels.start: Start of the trial, that is whenever the first toe marker passes the start line, or the initial sample.
Levels.end: End of the trial, that is whenever the last heel marker passes the end line, or the last sample.
Levels.initial_contact_left: Initial contact of the left foot.
Levels.final_contact_left: Final contact of the left foot.
Levels.initial_contact_right: Initial contact of the right foot.
Levels.final_contact_right: Final contact of the right foot.
